body:
Comment 7: 
The binary distributions are built on a machine (gherkin) that runs Mac OS X 10.6
(10K549), so I guess that could be the issue.

We chose an older version of OS X thinking that builds made there would be compatible
with newer versions of OS X. I set no special environment variables when running
misc/dist.

I am able to reproduce the issue on that machine, using a fresh build of either go1.1.2
and tip. (see the attached logs)
Attachments: 1. gherkin-tip.log (13600 bytes) 1. gherkin-go1.1.2.log (20692 bytes)
